九州方面より艦隊を展開し、\n佐世保、那覇などの南西諸島\n方面の要港周辺を哨戒: Deploy a fleet from Kyushu and patrol the vicinity of Sasebo, Naha, and other key ports in the Nansei Islands! Ensure the safety of maritime transportation routes!
高雄警備府～比島北部沖: Takao Guard District - North of the Philippines
台湾よりバシー海峡を越え、\n比島北部友軍へ防衛輸送作戦\nを実施！また、南西方: From Taiwan, cross the Bashi Strait and conduct a defensive transport operation to our friendly forces north of the Philippines! Also, cooperate with the Nansei Area Fleet to secure air superiority!
我が本土強襲を企図する深海\n機動部隊を八丈島沖で捕捉、\n我が捷号作戦主力を以: Capture the abyssal task force planning to attack the mainland off Hachijoujima, and intercept the enemy fleet with the main force of Operation Shou-Gou! Launch the fleet!
佐世保鎮守府に入港しました。: We have entered the Sasebo Naval Base.
友軍の港に入港しました。: We have entered a friendly port.
周辺海域に敵機動部隊の動向あり！\n警戒せよ！:
There's movement of enemy task forces in
the surrounding waters! Be on the lookout!
南西方面艦隊、出撃！\nバシー海峡の制海権を確保せよ！:
Nansei Area Fleet, sortie!
Secure control of the Bashi Strait!
